name: Essa
greetingText: You're my little star shining bright!
wishText: May all the joy in the world fill your tiny heart! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy 1st Birthday to my precious little one!
text3: Because today is all about you.
text4: I discovered, I wanted to plan something
outroText: Thank you for bringing so much joy into our lives.
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
